verses.roman:
tabe raghunātha kichu cintilā upāya
vinati kariyā kahe sei mleccha-pāya

synonyms: tabe—then; raghunātha-Raghunātha dāsa Gosvāmī; kichu—some; cintilā—thought of; upāya—means; vinati kariyā—in great humility; kahe—he says; sei mleccha—of that Mohammedan caudhurī; pāya—at the feet.
translation: While this was going on, Raghunātha dāsa thought of a tricky method of escape. Thus he humbly submitted this plea at the feet of the Mohammedan caudhurī.
